pubspec.name: dnd
pubspec.author: Marco Jakob <majakob@gmx.ch>
pubspec.description: Drag and Drop for Dart web apps with mouse and touch support.

sections.title: Follow Dart file conventions
sections.summary:

* Found example at: `example/example.dart`

sections.title: Platform Support
sections.summary:
### [*] 20/20 points: Supports 1 of 6 possible platforms (iOS, Android, **Web**, Windows, MacOS, Linux)

* âœ“ Web

These platforms are not supported:

<details>
<summary>
Package not compatible with platform Android
</summary>

Because:
* `package:dnd/dnd.dart` that imports:
* `dart:js`
</details>
<details>
<summary>
Package not compatible with platform iOS
</summary>

Because:

* `dart:js`
</details>
<details>

<details>

sections.title: Pass static analysis
sections.summary: ### [*] 30/30 points: code has no errors, warnings, lints, or formatting issues

sections.title: Support up-to-date dependencies
sections.summary:
### [*] 10/10 points: All of the package dependencies are supported in the latest version

No dependencies.

To reproduce run `dart pub outdated --no-dev-dependencies --up-to-date --no-dependency-overrides`.


### [*] 10/10 points: Package supports latest stable Dart and Flutter SDKs

sections.title: Support sound null safety
sections.summary: ### [*] 20/20 points: Package and dependencies are fully migrated to null safety!
